"A.P.241/9/23/14:00":
"What?! What!?
How did you get back here,
<%me>!?"

"More importantly, are you ok!?
Is there anything wrong!?
Uhh, uhhh...!"

"Man, you're always so sudden.
But I am glad you're safe."

"Mind telling us what just
happened?"

"Even if you just asked, I'm sure
that you're just bothering them."

"I'm sorry for bringing you back
so abruptly. I was just impatient as well."

"And you are...
How did you get in here?"

"How? But didn't I just come in here
like the wind and entered the room?"

"Oh! Don't tell me you were having a
secret meeting? I'm sorry, you have
to knock before entering right?"

"How awful of me. Perhaps because I
was by myself for so long, that I
have forgotten how to interact with others."

"Teleportation readings... nothing?
She's not ARKS, but these readings,
she's made of nothing but photons."

"But she's not a Darker...
Do you know her?"

"Odd...
Why is everyone acting so
weird?"
"What exactly are you?"

"Ah! I see. You don't know who
I am. I'm sorry, the thought didn't
cross my mind."
"My name is Alma."

"Would it help you understand better
if I've told you that I was the
first Claris Claes?"

"But as of now, I'm just Alma.
So if you could just call me Alma,
that'll be great."

"The First Claris Claes?
But she's supposed to be dead."

"My body is long gone?
Well, what you see is just
pure photons now."

"As you already know, but when my
body was destroyed by Luther."

"My heart and photons, never disappeared.
And was with the Akashic Record the
entire time."

"Basically, when I died. My soul
became part of the Akashic Record.
Understand?"
"1. You want us to believe such claims?"
"2. Can you back your claims?"

"Such claims you say?
Hmm, how can I get you to
believe me..."

"Hmm evidence, evidence... I wonder if
there's something... Oh right!"

"Ah, right! I'll show you a
cool trick!"

"Ok! Watch carefully now.
Three, two, one..."

"Huh? When did you...
That wasn't teleportation?"

"That feeling... myself and
<%me> know it all too well."

"It's the same technique that
Luther used to stop time, right?"

"That's right. He managed to copy it
from me after doing various experiments on myself."

"Oh also, Su gets really mad if claim it's
a technique, claming \"Don't be silly. This
is magic, not a technique.\""

"Gi and Ri were always clueless
on how I was doing that."

"Oh yeah! Gi and Ri are still around
right? Those two know who I am!"

"Gi? Ri?
Who are you referring to?"

"You might know them as Regius and
Maria. They're still doing fine?"

"Those sound like nicknames that
would stun them if you were to
call them that."

"Oh, you understand?
They always tell me to stop
calling them that."

"They're currently on a mission
and won't be back for some time."

"Is that so?
That's too bad."

"Ah, wait. That wouldn't matter anyways...
Those two never had a connection with Xion, so they wouldn't be able see me anyways!"
"You knew Xion?"

"Of course! We were always together.
It's how I know about Xiao too."

"If one doesn't have a connection with
Xion, they won't be able to see you..."
"Is that why you came to us? A soul of the Akashic Record?"

"Yep. Only people who have had a
connection with Xion can see me
in this current state."

"And also, the only beings that can
stand against that thing is you as well."
"I understand that it will be difficult for you to trust me. I'll tell you everything that I know."

"So that way, you can think for
yourselves and amongst yourselves."
"The Stranger"
"Salvation Vanguard"
